projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

body.p: Sekoddeśaḥ
om namaḥ kālacakrāya

lg.l: śṛṇu sucandra sekārthaṃ saptadhā trividhaṃ param /
abhijñālābhibhiḥ sā tu kartavyā naiva paṇḍitaiḥ // Sekoddeśa_5 //
ete sapta sekā deyā vartayitvā tu maṇḍalam // Sekoddeśa_14 //
payodharābhiṣiktaḥ sa bālaḥ prāptaṃ yataḥ sukham // Sekoddeśa_18 //
prauḍho guhyābhiṣiktaḥ sa guhyāt prāptaṃ yataḥ sukham // Sekoddeśa_19 //
prajñājñānābhiṣiktaḥ sa vṛddhaḥ spandaṃ gato yataḥ // Sekoddeśa_20 //
mahāprajñābhiṣiktaḥ sa yato niḥspandatāṃ gataḥ // Sekoddeśa_21 //
kālacakra iha khyāto yogināṃ muktidāyakaḥ // Sekoddeśa_23 //
dṛśyate svapnavad bimbaṃ tad bimbaṃ bhāvayet sadā // Sekoddeśa_27 //
abhāve bhāvanā bimbe yogināṃ sā na bhāvanā /
tat prādeśikanetrābhyāṃ gatvā paśyanti sādhakāḥ // Sekoddeśa_32 //
yadi paśyati sadrūpaṃ svamukhaṃ kiṃ na paśyati /
yadi paśyatyasadrūpaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ kathaṃ na ca // Sekoddeśa_33 //
dṛśyamānamajātaṃ tat kumāryā jātakaṃ yathā // Sekoddeśa_34 //
dṛṣṭe bimbe tataḥ kuryāt prāṇāyāmaṃ nirantaram /

body.p: candraḥ kāya upāyasya prajñāyā vāgdivākaraḥ / prajñākāyastu viṇnāḍī virbhorvāṅmūtravāhinī // Sekoddeśa_38 //

ariṣṭaṃ kāyavāṅnāḍyorūrdhvādho 'dhikamārutaiḥ /
taminīśukravāhinyorutpattimaraṇasthitiḥ // Sekoddeśa_41 //

lg.l: taminī ca vahatyūrdhve saṃkrāntau viṣuve raveḥ // Sekoddeśa_42 //

body.p: lagnodayābhisaṃdhau ca viṣuvaṃ vahati madhye / ṣaṭpañcāśatsapādañca śvāsocchvāsaṃ narādhipa // Sekoddeśa_43 //

lg.l: vāmā ca dakṣiṇā nāḍī vahatyūnānanena tān /

body.p: adho viṇmūtravāhinyau pṛthvīvāyusvarūpake / madhyanāḍī ca vāmā cacakradhṛk khaḍgadhṛṅmate // Sekoddeśa_47 //
ūrdhvādho madhyamā savyā rāhuśukrapravāhinī / śūnyajñānasvabhāvinyau vajradhṛgvajradhṛṅmate // Sekoddeśa_48 //

lg.l: jātau mṛtyau viṣuve rāge rāhuṇā śukravāhinī // Sekoddeśa_49 //
yādhaḥ khagamukhā sā ca śaṅkhinī śukravāhinī // Sekoddeśa_50 //

body.p:
nirgacchantī viśantīsāsṛṣṭinā viśati kṣitau /
karṇikāt karṇikāmadhye 'vadhūtyā gatirāgatiḥ // Sekoddeśa_52 //

lg.l: eṣā strīṇāṃ sukhācchukraṃ ṛtau raktapravāhinī // Sekoddeśa_54 //

body.p: prajñopāyāṅgabhāvena ūrdhve savyāvasavyayoḥ / adho viṇmūtravāhasya rajaḥśukrapravāhayoḥ // Sekoddeśa_55 //
caṇḍālī rajaso vāhāt khagamukhā śukravāhataḥ / ūdhve ṛtau smṛtā strīṇāṃ ḍombī puṃso 'vadhūtikā // Sekoddeśa_56 //
vijñānādyaṃ sadā vāme nāḍyāṃ maṇḍalapañcakam / bhūmyādidakṣiṇe nāḍyāṃ madhye vahati ṣaṣṭhamam // Sekoddeśa_57 //

lg.l: vāme ca dakṣiṇe lagne meṣādye vṛṣabhādike // Sekoddeśa_58 //

body.p:
mūle vāme tataḥ savya ūrdhvemadhye 'nilaḥ kramāt /
ekaikamaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍādbhūmyādyaṃ nāsarandhrayoḥ // Sekoddeśa_59 //

lg.l: dalamadhye tataḥ pūrve savye vāme 'pare kramāt // Sekoddeśa_61 //
vijñānādibhavo vāme saṃhāraḥ kṣmādi dakṣiṇe // Sekoddeśa_62 //
apare pūrve dharā vāyuḥ prajñopāyaḥ parasparam /
karatale puṭite mūrdhni ekaśūkaṃ sakartikam // Sekoddeśa_66 //

body.p: vāmāyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ vā pravahatyadhiko 'nilaḥ / ekarātraṃ tathā pañca trivarṣairmaraṇaṃtataḥ // Sekoddeśa_70 //
mūlādekottareṇa syādvāme candrasya rohaṇam / dinairmāsairdinairmāsaistridināni dvimāsakau // Sekoddeśa_73 //
anyathā maraṇaṃ na syāt pakṣadvayasyasaṃsthiteḥ / savyāvasavyasaṃcārāta pañcamaṇḍalavāhataḥ // Sekoddeśa_76 //
ariṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ jñātvā prāṇaṃ bindau niveśayet / avadhūtīpadamāśrityabhāvayetparamākṣaram // Sekoddeśa_77 //

lg.l: kaṇṭhe hṛdi paramānandaṃ viramānandaṃ tato bhavet // Sekoddeśa_80 //
kalā ṣoḍaśamā yā sā maṇipadme vajramūrdhagā // Sekoddeśa_83 //
amārkarajaso guhye kaloṣṇīṣe maṇau tayoḥ // Sekoddeśa_88 //

body.p:
maṇau cittaṃcaguhye vākkāyo nābhau mahāsukhāt /
dharmasambhoganirmāṇāḥ śuddhakāyāt spharantyamī // Sekoddeśa_90 //

adhopāyasya rājendra prajñāyāūrdhvato bhavet /
lalāṭe kāyavajramasyā grīvahṛnnābhipaṅkaje // Sekoddeśa_91 //

lg.l: vṛddhasya na ca syāt vṛddhiḥ kṣīṇasya kṣīṇatā na ca /
na prakāśaḥ prakāśasya pihitaṃ pihitasya na /
jātasyaiva na janma syān mṛtasya maraṇaṃ na ca // Sekoddeśa_95 //
muktasya na ca muktiḥ syādasthitasya ca cāsthitiḥ /
abhāvo na hyabhāvasya bhāvo bhāvasya naiva ca // Sekoddeśa_96 //
kṣarasyāpi kṣaro na syādakṣarasya na cākṣaraḥ /
na kṣayaṃ yānti bhūtāni na jāyante svabhāvataḥ /

body.p: yathoditaḥ kramāccandraḥ kalābhiryāti pūrṇatām / vāsanāharaṇaṃ pūrṇānacandracchedo na pūraṇam // Sekoddeśa_102 //
tathoditaṃ kramājjñānaṃ bhūmibhiryāti pūrṇatām / kleśādyāharaṇaṃ pūrṇānajñānacchedo na pūraṇam // Sekoddeśa_103 //

lg.l: yathā madhyaśaśāṅkena pūrṇāyāṃ na sthiraḥ śaśī /

body.p:
utpattiḥ pralayaḥ pakṣaḥśuklaḥkṛṣṇaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
tayormadhye tu yā pūrṇā sā pūrṇā na pratiṣṭhitā // Sekoddeśa_105 //

lg.l: yadā vajramaṇau citaṃ tat sarvakṣaṇapūrakam // Sekoddeśa_106 //
na sthitiḥ śuklapakṣe 'sya gamanaṃ nāsite kvacit /

body.p: uṣṇīṣādudayaṃ tasya pūrṇā vajramaṇau bhavet / savirāgāt kalāhānirvajrāddhāneḥ prapūrṇatā // Sekoddeśa_108 //

lg.l: uṣṇīse hyudayo bhūyaḥ pūrṇā vajramaṇau punaḥ /

body.p:
mahāsukhasvabhāvo 'sya pūrṇāśabdena gīyate /
anyabhāvāntaraṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārahetukam // Sekoddeśa_110 //

lg.l: svapakṣābhyāṃ yathāṃ candro 'yanābhyāṃ bhāskaro yathā // Sekoddeśa_111 //
pūrṇāvasthāṃ gataṃ cittaṃ āsamantāt prapūritam // Sekoddeśa_115 //

body.p: virāgādimahārāgaṃ vajrānaṅgaṃ mahākṣaram / paripūrṇamasaṃkliṣṭaṃ pakṣadvayasyavāsanaiḥ // Sekoddeśa_116 //
yathā nadyudakaṃ viṣṭaṃ samudre tatpayaḥsamam / tathā bhāvasamūho 'yamakṣare tatsamo 'kṣaraḥ // Sekoddeśa_117 //

yathā dhātusamūho 'yaṃ rasatvaṃ yāti bhakṣitaḥ /
bījairbījasva bhāvaṃ ca phalakāle mānavarjitam // Sekoddeśa_118 //

lg.l: na daṃśe vedanāṃ vetti nānyatra cāpi daṣṭakaḥ /
na viṣayānindriyadvāraiḥ pūrṇāvasthāṃ viṣe gate // Sekoddeśa_120 //
evaṃ na ca maṇau yogī nānyatra vetti satsukham /
yathā ca viddhalohānāṃ naiva malo bhavet kvacit /
tathā ca viddhacittānāṃ na vāsanā bhavet kvacit // Sekoddeśa_124 //
hematvaṃ hi gataṃ lohamagninā nirmalaṃ bhavet /
bhūyo bhūyastathā cittaṃ nirmalaṃ rāgavahninā // Sekoddeśa_125 //
na cittena vinā jāto na citte saṃsthito 'vyayaḥ // Sekoddeśa_129 //
cirakālī yadā cittāttasyaiva sambhavaḥ kutaḥ // Sekoddeśa_130 //
yadi cittaṃ vinā jātastadā khakusumaṃ yathā /
yadi sthitaḥ sadā citte na naśyet sarvatastadā // Sekoddeśa_131 //
na tasya sattvatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā // Sekoddeśa_132 //
na tasya jñānatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā // Sekoddeśa_133 //
rasaviddho yathā loho na punarlohatāṃ vrajet /
sukhaviddhaṃ tathā cittaṃ na punarduḥkhatāṃ vrajet // Sekoddeśa_134 //
na virāgāt paraṃ pāpaṃ na puṇyaṃ sukhataḥ param /
ato 'kṣarasukhe cittaṃ veśanīyaṃ sadā nṛpa // Sekoddeśa_135 //
vaktuṃ na śakyate saukhyaṃ kumāryā surataṃ vinā /
yauvane surataṃ prāpya svato vetti mahāsukham // Sekoddeśa_136 //
evaṃ na śakyate vaktuṃ samādhirahitaiḥ sukham /
samādhāvakṣaraṃ prāpya svato vindanti yoginaḥ // Sekoddeśa_137 //
tathā kvacinna kartavyo virāgo manaso 'sukhāt // Sekoddeśa_138 //
duḥkhāddhātukṣayaḥ puṃsāṃ kṣayān mṛtyuriti smṛtaḥ // Sekoddeśa_139 //
evaṃ virāgasaṃbhūteḥ sattvānāṃ nānyathā bhavaḥ // Sekoddeśa_140 //
mayokte kiṃ punastantre yogī duḥkhaṃ samīhate // Sekoddeśa_142 //
phalena mudrito heturhetunā mudritaṃ phalam // Sekoddeśa_146 //
hetuḥ phalaṃ ca yat sarvaṃ tat pratītyasamudbhavam /
anyonyamudritaṃ bimbaṃ notpannaṃ na ca nirvṛtam // Sekoddeśa_154 //
ato na cātmanātmānaṃ mudrituṃ śakyate kvacit /
na prajñā nāpyupāyo 'sau sahajaḥ prajñayā saha /
krodharāṭ ṣaṇmukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṭkulaiḥ pariśodhitaḥ // Sekoddeśa_172 //
